dt-api.name: responsive.hasHidden()
dt-api.summary: Determine if Responsive has hidden any columns in the table

type.description: Determine if columns have been hidden by Responsive or not.
type.returns: `true` if columns have been hidden by Responsive, `false` otherwise.

dt-api.description: This method provides the ability to programmatically determine if Responsive has hidden any columns in the table or not. The result will reflect the state of the table when the method is called.

example.title: Hide a column completely by adding a class name and rebuilding
